iti11:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti11:2.1_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding delusion, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
iti11:2.2_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding delusion, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
iti11:3.2_0: sentient beings go to a bad place,
iti11:3.5_0: They give up food and drink,
iti11:3.6_0: in this world with its gods.”
iti11:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
iti11:4.2_0: First the first part of the body.
